segments.text: How much for a bus pass ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , for a monthly pass , it'll cost you $ 65 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else that doesn't cost as much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're a student , you can get a student bus pass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much does a student pass cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That actual bus pass is free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only thing you'll have to pay for is the monthly sticker .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me how much that'll cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good , let me get that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll get it for you right now .
segments.speaker: S2
